Text: URGENT Update Contact Details with PwCPST Dear Enron Assignee As Enron Global Employee Services has previously indicated arrangements have been made with PricewaterhouseCoopers to continue expatinpat tax services for the and tax years As contact information may be changing over the next few months please be sure to provide the updated information to PwC We will be distributing tax data organizers via email and will require an active email address Please send you updated contact information to Kind Regards The PwC Enron Team The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

URGENT Update contact details with PWCPST Dear Enron Assignee As Enron Global Employee Services has previously indicated arrangements have been made with PricewaterhouseCoopers to continue expatinpat tax services for the and tax years As contact information may be changing over the next few months please be sure to provide the updated information to PwC We will be distributing tax data organizers via email and will require an active email address Note This applies only to assignees who receive tax preparation assistance as part of the expatinpat contract If you have questions on authorization status please contact your HR rep Please send you updated contact information to Kind Regards The PwC Enron Team The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer
